testsuite.name: TicTacToeTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #2
The first field is correct, but the second is not
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Enter cells: > _XXOO_OX_ --------- | X X | | O O | | O X | --------- Enter the coordinates: Enter the coordinates: > 4 1 Coordinates should be from 1 to 3! Enter the coordinates: > 1 2 This cell is occupied! Choose another one! Enter the coordinates: > 1 3 This cell is occupied! Choose another one! Enter the coordinates: > 2 1 --------- | X X | | X O | | O X | ---------
